Types
SoundFlag
enum SoundFlag {...}

Sound flags

Values
SND_VOLUME

(1) Volume flag

SND_PITCH

(2) Pitch flag

SND_ATTENUATION

(4) Attenuation flag

SND_ORIGIN

(8) Origin flag

SND_ENT

(16) Entity flag

SND_STOP

(32) Stop flag

SND_CHANGE_VOL

(64) Change volume flag

SND_CHANGE_PITCH

(128) Change pitch flag

SND_SENTENCE

(256) Sentence flag

SND_REFRESH

(512) Refresh flag

SND_FORCE_SINGLE

(1024) Force single flag

SND_FORCE_LOOP

(2048) Force loop flag

SND_LINEAR

(4096) Linear flag

SND_SKIP_ORIGIN_USE_ENT

(8192) Skip Origin and use entity flag
